Student Club Forum at Qatar University
22  February,  2024
The Best Buddies Club at Qatar University was reactivated through participation in an awareness booth at the Student Club Forum at Qatar University throughout the week. The booth aimed to introduce the vision and mission of the initiative for social integration and to encourage new members to join the club. The booth was also visited by the esteemed President of the University, Dr. Omar Al-Ansari.
